```{r setup-{{cur_game_info$game_name_abbr}}}
fig_height <- 3 * nrow(
  targets::tar_read_raw(str_glue("indices_{cur_game_info$game_name_abbr}"))
)
```

## {{cur_game_info$game_name}}

* English Name: `r cur_game_info$game_name_en`
* Abbreviation: `r cur_game_info$game_name_abbr`

### Age development

```{r age-dev-plot-{{cur_game_info$game_name_abbr}}, fig.width=10, fig.height=fig_height}
targets::tar_read_raw(
  str_glue("age_dev_plot_{cur_game_info$game_name_abbr}")
)
```

### Test-Retest Reliability

```{r test-retest-table-{{cur_game_info$game_name_abbr}}}
targets::tar_read_raw(
  str_glue("test_retest_stats_{cur_game_info$game_name_abbr}")
) %>% 
  select(-game_id) %>% 
  knitr::kable(digits = 2)
```

```{r test-retest-fig-{{cur_game_info$game_name_abbr}}, fig.width=4, fig.height=fig_height}

)
```
